post.body: Vimperator is a fine plugin, i just want a *good* vim textarea/input plugin. Recordable vim macros are the new UserScript!
too true.No such thing as "unlimited",just "fair" (ROFLMAO) usage policies.And I can't even get a bandwidth meter until after the event.
it was kinda easier to sign up for spotify using the URL mentioned in techcrunch's recent article http://is.gd/ev7l than get an invite
has launched http://unobtrusify.com, a neat microsite with an important message
yes it's annoying, but data URIs do work in IE8...just images unfortunately no sound or anything else
thanks @FND. BTW my vimperatorrc -> http://pastebin.com/f3e19c4de
woo mailing to twitpic came through, albeit from pc rather than iphone/shozu. Just be prepared for ~5 mins delay.
http://twitpic.com/104z9 - Rebuilding tiddlywiki comments plugin with better permissioning model
tried to get my mobile data limit increased, but forgot that 250MB is already their "unlimited" limit. Welcome to 1999, have a nice day.
uploaded whiteboard design to twitpic, but it's not shown up yet :/
Day 1 in the Osmoplex. Drenched in post-snow sunshine, our contestants have settled down to code amid a smooth mix of laid-back urban beats.
BTW Songbird truly *RAWKS*.Half iTunes,Half Firefox.Pluggable all over. How could it not be awesome? Just the thing for pre NYE festivities.
"Firebug 1.2.1 could not be installed because it is not compatible with Songbird 1.0.0." it was worth a cheeky try o.O
found a crucial scheduling bug in my twitter wordpress twitter plugin, hopefully it's working now. I'll now in a couple of hours.
Begun posting twitter chapter summaries of the Black Swan to @blackswanreview. Thought-provoking book, that.
if you haven't got a contact form with captcha on your site, go get one - It makes spam 10 times funnier!
Today's mild understatement from the LA Times: "VHS era is winding down" (something about a stop button perhaps?)
wikipedia -> db conversion is going to take ~18 days to complete at this rate (1.5 pages per sec!). Pushing it to a server.
kicked off wikipedia dump->db import to see how easily I can rebuild wikiwordia as a server-side driven app
finishing off a twitter wordpress plugin - posts to wordpress your latest tweets, with minimum threshold to avoid spamming readers every day
